# <a name="keyboard-shortcuts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="a885f-102">"Outlook.com" spartieji klavišai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a885f-102">Keyboard shortcuts in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a885f-103">"Outlook.com" galite naudoti pačių sparčiųjų klavišų, kaip esate įpratę dirbti su, pvz., Gmail, Yahoo Mail arba "Outlook.com" el. pašto tarnyba.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a885f-103">In Outlook.com you can use the same keyboard shortcuts as the email service you're used to working with, such as Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or Outlook.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a885f-104">Eiti į [pritaikymo neįgaliesiems parametrus](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a885f-104">Go to [Accessibility settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="a885f-105">**Parametrai**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a885f-105">**Settings**</span></span> 
 > <span data-ttu-id="a885f-106">**Peržiūrėti visus "Outlook" parametrai** > **bendrojo** > **prieinamumo**) ir pasirinkite kurie spartieji klaviatūros klavišai, kaip jūs naudotumėte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a885f-106">**View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Accessibility**) and choose which keyboard shortcuts you'd like use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a885f-107">Peržiūrėkite visą klaviatūros sparčiųjų klavišų sąrašą, skaitykite ["Outlook.com" spartieji klavišai](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a885f-107">To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, see [Outlook.com keyboard shortcuts](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
